title: Scaffold apps/korpor.us from kanb.us with local UI primitives
description: Create Gatsby+Tailwind site scaffold by copying apps/kanb.us, remove @kanbus/ui dependency, and provide local UI primitives/components required for parity layout and behavior.

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text: Scaffolded apps/korpor.us from kanb.us structure, replaced @kanbus/ui coupling with local primitives, and preserved Gatsby/Tailwind/theme/navigation topology.
